# Support

## Getting Help

We're here to help! Here are the best ways to get support for Diffyne:

### üìö Documentation

First, check our comprehensive documentation:
- [Getting Started Guide](https://github.com/diffyne/docs/blob/main/getting-started/first-component.md)
- [Features Documentation](https://github.com/diffyne/docs/tree/main/features)
- [Examples](https://github.com/diffyne/docs/tree/main/examples)

### üí¨ Community Support

- **GitHub Discussions**: Ask questions and share ideas in our [Discussions](https://github.com/diffyne/diffyne/discussions) section
- **GitHub Issues**: Report bugs or request features in [Issues](https://github.com/diffyne/diffyne/issues)

### üêõ Reporting Bugs

When reporting a bug, please include:

1. **Description**: Clear description of the issue
2. **Steps to Reproduce**: Detailed steps to reproduce the problem
3. **Expected Behavior**: What you expected to happen
4. **Actual Behavior**: What actually happened
5. **Environment**:
   - PHP version
   - Laravel version
   - Diffyne version
   - Browser (if applicable)
6. **Code Example**: Minimal code example that demonstrates the issue
7. **Screenshots/Logs**: If applicable, include screenshots or error logs

### ‚ú® Feature Requests

We welcome feature requests! When suggesting a feature:

1. **Use Cases**: Explain the use case and why it's needed
2. **Proposed Solution**: Describe how you envision it working
3. **Alternatives**: Mention any alternatives you've considered
4. **Additional Context**: Any other relevant information

### üìß Direct Contact

For urgent issues or commercial support inquiries:
- **Email**: xentixar@gmail.com

## Response Times

- **Critical Bugs**: Within 24 hours
- **General Issues**: Within 3-5 business days
- **Feature Requests**: Reviewed during our planning cycles

## Contributing

Want to help improve Diffyne? Check out our [Contributing Guide](CONTRIBUTING.md)!

## Resources

- **Documentation**: [Full Documentation](https://github.com/diffyne/docs)
- **Examples**: [Code Examples](https://github.com/diffyne/docs/tree/main/examples)
- **Changelog**: See [CHANGELOG.md](https://github.com/diffyne/diffyne/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md) for version history

Thank you for using Diffyne! üöÄ
